languages.text: "Своим отказом ты обидишь уже не только скоморохов отсталой планеты".
"The fools of this backward world won't be the only ones insulted should you refuse."
languages.original_text: "Своим отказом ты обидишь уже не только скоморохов отсталой планеты".

traits.locale_text: "The fools of this backward world won't be the only ones insulted should you refuse."
"The fools of this backward world won't be the only ones insulted should you refuse."
"The fools of this backward world won't be the only ones insulted should you refuse."
"The fools of this backward world won't be the only ones insulted should you refuse."
"The fools of this backward world won't be the only ones insulted should you refuse."

languages.text: "Es sind nicht nur die Narren auf dieser rückständigen Welt beleidigt, falls Ihr ablehnt."
languages.original_text: "The fools of this backward world won't be the only ones insulted should you refuse."

traits.locale_text: "Es sind nicht nur die Narren auf dieser rückständigen Welt beleidigt, falls Ihr ablehnt."

languages.text: « Les bouffons de ce monde arriéré ne seront pas les seuls à se sentir insultés si vous refusez. »
languages.original_text: "The fools of this backward world won't be the only ones insulted should you refuse."

traits.locale_text: « Les bouffons de ce monde arriéré ne seront pas les seuls à se sentir insultés si vous refusez. »

languages.text: 「もし君が拒めば、この後進世界の道化たちだけでなく、他の者たちまでもが侮辱されたことになるだろう」
languages.original_text: "The fools of this backward world won't be the only ones insulted should you refuse."

traits.locale_text: 「もし君が拒めば、この後進世界の道化たちだけでなく、他の者たちまでもが侮辱されたことになるだろう」

languages.text: «Los bufones de este mundo atrasado no serán los únicos insultados si se niega».
languages.original_text: "The fools of this backward world won't be the only ones insulted should you refuse."

traits.locale_text: «Los bufones de este mundo atrasado no serán los únicos insultados si se niega».

languages.text: “如果你拒绝的话，你侮辱的就不仅仅是这个落后世界的蠢货了。”
languages.original_text: "The fools of this backward world won't be the only ones insulted should you refuse."

traits.locale_text: “如果你拒绝的话，你侮辱的就不仅仅是这个落后世界的蠢货了。”

languages.text: "Reddedersen sadece bu ilkel dünyanın sakinlerine ayıp olmayacak."
languages.original_text: "The fools of this backward world won't be the only ones insulted should you refuse."

traits.locale_text: "Reddedersen sadece bu ilkel dünyanın sakinlerine ayıp olmayacak."
